Microsoft Visual Studio Code is a nice text (and much more!) editor.

### Installation

To install it on your machine, you can either download from [https://code.visualstudio.com](https://code.visualstudio.com), or use [HomeBrew](https://brew.sh):
```
brew install visual-studio-code
```
